mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_num desc limit 10
mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_member_num, notice_subject, notice_content, notice_writeday) values (#{notice_member_num}, #{notice_subject}, #{notice_content}, now())
mapper.update: update notice set notice_subject=#{notice_subject}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_num=#{notice_num}
update notice set notice_readcount=notice_readcount+1 where notice_num=#{notice_num}
